segments.text: So , are you going to go to class tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe ... but I don't think so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . I'm just feeling a little sad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Listen . Come with me to class , and after class we can go out for dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now that's a good idea . Thanks a lot , Brian . I'm feeling better already .
segments.speaker: S2
